languages.text: {n}Вам доводилось встречать теории, касающиеся того, как древняя ксенораса обрела свою металлическую форму, что за могучие существа научили их нежизни и к какому жестокому конфликту привело их сосуществование в дальнейшем. Теперь вы знаете эту историю от очевидца.{/n}

{n}You have come across theories that speak of an ancient xenos race that gained a metallic form, of mighty beings that showed said race the ways of unlife, and of a cruel and bitter conflict that subsequently ended their coexistence. Now you have an eyewitness account of those events.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам доводилось встречать теории, касающиеся того, как древняя ксенораса обрела свою металлическую форму, что за могучие существа научили их нежизни и к какому жестокому конфликту привело их сосуществование в дальнейшем. Теперь вы знаете эту историю от очевидца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You've come across theories that spoke of an ancient xenos race which gained a metallic form, of mighty beings which instructed that race in the ways of unlife, and of a cruel and bitter conflict which subsequently ended their coexistence. Now you have an eyewitness account of those events.{/n}

{n}You have come across theories that speak of an ancient xenos race that gained a metallic form, of mighty beings that showed said race the ways of unlife, and of a cruel and bitter conflict that subsequently ended their coexistence. Now you have an eyewitness account of those events.{/n}

{n}You have come across theories that speak of an ancient xenos race that gained a metallic form, of mighty beings that showed said race the ways of unlife, and of a cruel and bitter conflict that subsequently ended their coexistence. Now you have an eyewitness account of those events.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Has visto teorías que hablan de una antigua raza xenos que adoptó forma metálica y de poderosos seres que enseñaron a esa raza la senda de la no vida, así como de un conflicto cruel y espantoso que puso fin a la coexistencia entre ambas. Ahora tienes ante ti la narración de un testigo presencial de los hechos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have come across theories that speak of an ancient xenos race that gained a metallic form, of mighty beings that showed said race the ways of unlife, and of a cruel and bitter conflict that subsequently ended their coexistence. Now you have an eyewitness account of those events.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Has visto teorías que hablan de una antigua raza xenos que adoptó forma metálica y de poderosos seres que enseñaron a esa raza la senda de la no vida, así como de un conflicto cruel y espantoso que puso fin a la coexistencia entre ambas. Ahora tienes ante ti la narración de un testigo presencial de los hechos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez entendu des théories parlant d'une espèce ancienne de xénos qui a pris une forme métallique, des puissants êtres qui l'ont guidée sur la voie de la non-vie, et du conflit acharné qui a mis fin à leur coexistence. À présent, vous disposez d'un témoignage de ces événements.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have come across theories that speak of an ancient xenos race that gained a metallic form, of mighty beings that showed said race the ways of unlife, and of a cruel and bitter conflict that subsequently ended their coexistence. Now you have an eyewitness account of those events.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez entendu des théories parlant d'une espèce ancienne de xénos qui a pris une forme métallique, des puissants êtres qui l'ont guidée sur la voie de la non-vie, et du conflit acharné qui a mis fin à leur coexistence. À présent, vous disposez d'un témoignage de ces événements.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは金属の体を手にした古代の異種族と、彼らに不死の道を示した強大な存在、そして両者の共存を終わらせた残虐で悲惨な争いについての理論を知った。こうしてあなたは、それらの出来事の目撃談を手に入れたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have come across theories that speak of an ancient xenos race that gained a metallic form, of mighty beings that showed said race the ways of unlife, and of a cruel and bitter conflict that subsequently ended their coexistence. Now you have an eyewitness account of those events.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは金属の体を手にした古代の異種族と、彼らに不死の道を示した強大な存在、そして両者の共存を終わらせた残虐で悲惨な争いについての理論を知った。こうしてあなたは、それらの出来事の目撃談を手に入れたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你早就听说过这样的假设：某种强大的生物，向某个古老的异形种族展示了非生命的存在方式，让他们得到了金属的身体形态。但在那之后，他们之间爆发了一场残酷而痛苦的冲突，结束了他们之间的共存关系。如今，这样的假设已经找到了证据。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have come across theories that speak of an ancient xenos race that gained a metallic form, of mighty beings that showed said race the ways of unlife, and of a cruel and bitter conflict that subsequently ended their coexistence. Now you have an eyewitness account of those events.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你早就听说过这样的假设：某种强大的生物，向某个古老的异形种族展示了非生命的存在方式，让他们得到了金属的身体形态。但在那之后，他们之间爆发了一场残酷而痛苦的冲突，结束了他们之间的共存关系。如今，这样的假设已经找到了证据。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du weißt von Theorien, dass einmal eine uralte Xenos-Spezies metallischer Form existiert haben soll. Dass mächtige Wesen diese Spezies die Wege des Unlebens gelehrt haben sollen. Und dass die Koexistenz durch einen grausamen und bitteren Konflikt beendet worden sein soll. Nun hast du Augenzeugenberichte zu diesen Ereignissen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have come across theories that speak of an ancient xenos race that gained a metallic form, of mighty beings that showed said race the ways of unlife, and of a cruel and bitter conflict that subsequently ended their coexistence. Now you have an eyewitness account of those events.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du weißt von Theorien, dass einmal eine uralte Xenos-Spezies metallischer Form existiert haben soll. Dass mächtige Wesen dieser Spezies die Wege des Unlebens gelehrt haben sollen. Und dass die Koexistenz durch einen grausamen und bitteren Konflikt beendet worden sein soll. Nun hast du Augenzeugenberichte zu diesen Ereignissen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Metalik bir biçim kazanan kadim bir zeno ırkından, söz konusu ırka yaşamsızlığın yöntemlerini gösteren kudretli varlıklardan ve bir arada oldukları varoluşu sona erdiren amansız çatışmadan bahseden teorilere denk geldin. Şimdi bu olaylara şahit olmuş bir görgü tanığın var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have come across theories that speak of an ancient xenos race that gained a metallic form, of mighty beings that showed said race the ways of unlife, and of a cruel and bitter conflict that subsequently ended their coexistence. Now you have an eyewitness account of those events.{/n}
